price: “Не плаши се!” Рекоше, “доносимо ти радосну вест, ученог ћеш сина имати.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
